Every big shock of the world would end up lead an inflation, the purchasing power of the currecny rapidly decrease and the value of gold quickly increase. It's how the economy works.
On the other hand, the gold market is different from stock market. The main reason is, gold is a resource belonging to the whole world, nobody can dominate it. Hence, it's more fair in comparison.
